summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; declaring an airspace corridor over the Cedar River pipeline \#4 water transmission pipeline right-of-way, located in the City of Tukwila in the vicinity of Southcenter Shopping Mall in the S 1/2 of the SE 1/4 of Section 23, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington, surplus to the City's needs and not required for continued utility service, and authorizing sale of that airspace corridor to the Washington State Department of Transportation under the threat of condemnation.
